hero.title: Your Voice, Your Web
hero.text: Make your site extra with any kind of content you want, posted anywhere.

facets.title: Do Social, your way
facets.text: Group, share, comment, and gather all your content, however you want.

facets.title: Storify it
facets.text: Tell your story with the content you love. Use the flexible story editor to bring in any content and put together a shareable narrative that your friends can interact with.

facets.title: Make your mark
facets.text: Write and sticker all over your site and your friendsâ€™ sites.

facets.title: Custom code it
facets.text: Want to add some chaos to your Home? Inject custom code anywhere.
